doc:
Ken Leung https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ken_Leung 0 Kenneth Leung (born January 21, 1970) is an American actor who is best known for playing Miles Straume in Lost, Admiral Statura in Star Wars: The Force Awakens, Detective Stephen Sing in Saw, and Kid Omega in X-Men: The Last Stand. He portrays the Marvel Comics character Karnak, a member of the Inhumans, on the ABC television series Inhumans, which premiered in September 2017. Kenneth_Leung ( born January_21_,_1970 ) is an_American_actor who is_best_known for playing Miles_Straume in Lost , Admiral_Statura in Star_Wars : The_Force_Awakens , Detective_Stephen_Sing in Saw , and Kid_Omega in X-Men : The_Last_Stand . He portrays the_Marvel_Comics_character_Karnak , a_member of the_Inhumans , on the_ABC_television_series_Inhumans , which premiered in September_2017 .
